attributes.action: Not to increase the duty on alcohol as the Chief Medical Officer is suggesting as this makes Joe Public pay as well as the young drinkers that he is trying to target.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I agree that something must be done about the amount of young people drinking to excess. Living in a village near three Public Houses and having to keep windows closed and ear plugs in just to be able to sleep some nights, not to mention being afraid to go out at night incase I am attacked. Why don't we follow the U.S.A. in banning drinking until you are 21 years of age.
